title: 15: No Such Thing As A Bulge In Ken's Groin
content: This week in the QI office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) & Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) discuss Aztec popcorn, Top Gun in China, exploding dolls and David Cameron's door handle.
contentSnippet: This week in the QI office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) & Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) discuss Aztec popcorn, Top Gun in China, exploding dolls and David Cameron's door handle.
